query:
UPDATE api_pricing SET 
  supportedLanguages = '["de", "en", "fr", "es", "it", "pt", "nl", "pl", "ru", "zh", "ja", "ko"]',
  capabilities = CASE 
    WHEN modelName LIKE '%Embed%' THEN '["embedding"]'
    WHEN modelName LIKE '%Codestral%' OR modelName LIKE '%Code%' THEN '["chat", "code"]'
    WHEN modelName LIKE '%Vision%' THEN '["chat", "vision"]'
    WHEN modelName LIKE '%o3%' OR modelName LIKE '%o1%' THEN '["chat", "reasoning"]'
    ELSE '["chat", "code"]'
  END,
  contextWindow = CASE 
    WHEN modelName LIKE '%GPT-4%' OR modelName LIKE '%Claude%' THEN 128000
    WHEN modelName LIKE '%Gemini%' THEN 1000000
    WHEN modelName LIKE '%Mistral%' THEN 32000
    WHEN modelName LIKE '%Llama%' THEN 128000
    ELSE 32000
  END
WHERE supportedLanguages IS NULL;
